amendment.description: An amendment numbered 19 printed in House Report 113-170 to reduce RDT&E by $10 million and adds $10 million to RDT&E for Operationally Responsive Space (ORS).

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Lujan Grisham (NM) amendment was withdrawn.
Amendment (A018) offered by Ms. Lujan Grisham (NM).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A018) offered by Ms. Lujan Grisham (NM).
